tech.title: React
tech.details: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components. It is maintained by Meta and a community of individual developers and companies.

tech.title: Nextjs
tech.details: Nextjs is a framework base on react allow dev to build SPA and SSR app, and Static web site with no configurationâ€¦

tech.title: Tailwind css
tech.details: Tailwind CSS is an open source CSS framework. The main feature of this library is that, unlike other CSS frameworks like Bootstrap, it does not provide a series of predefined classes for elements such as buttons or tables

tech.title: NodeJs
tech.details: Nodejs is javascript runtime environment which helps js file to run outside of the browser resulting in making backend of a projects.
